016package io.micronaut.maven.openapi;
017
018import io.micronaut.maven.AbstractMicronautMojo;
019import io.micronaut.openapi.generator.MicronautCodeGeneratorBuilder;
020import io.micronaut.openapi.generator.MicronautCodeGeneratorEntryPoint;
021import io.micronaut.openapi.generator.SerializationLibraryKind;
022import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
023import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException;
024import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
025import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
026
027import java.io.File;
028import java.util.List;
029
030/**
031 * Base class for OpenAPI generator mojos. This provides the common
032 * parameters for all generators and the invoker logic. Subclasses
033 * must implement the {@link #isEnabled()} and {@link #configureBuilder(MicronautCodeGeneratorBuilder)}
034 * methods.
035 */
036public abstract class AbstractOpenApiMojo extends AbstractMicronautMojo {
037    static final String MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX = "micronaut.openapi";
038    static final String IO_MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX = "io.micronaut.openapi";
039
040    @Parameter(property = MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".definition", defaultValue = IO_MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".invoker", required = true)
041    protected File definitionFile;
042
043    @Parameter(property = MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".invoker.package.name", defaultValue = IO_MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".invoker", required = true)
044    protected String invokerPackageName;
045
046    @Parameter(property = MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".api.package.name", defaultValue = IO_MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".api", required = true)
047    protected String apiPackageName;
048
049    @Parameter(property = MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".model.package.name", defaultValue = IO_MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".model", required = true)
050    protected String modelPackageName;
051
052    @Parameter(property = MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".use.bean.validation", defaultValue = "true", required = true)
053    protected boolean useBeanValidation;
054
055    @Parameter(property = MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".use.optional", defaultValue = "false", required = true)
056    protected boolean useOptional;
057
058    @Parameter(property = MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".use.reactive", defaultValue = "true", required = true)
059    protected boolean useReactive;
060
061    @Parameter(property = MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".outputs", required = true, defaultValue = "apis,models")
062    protected List<String> outputKinds;
063
064    @Parameter(defaultValue = "${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/openapi", required = true)
065    protected File outputDirectory;
066
067    @Parameter(defaultValue = "${project}", readonly = true)
068    private MavenProject project;
069
070    /**
071     * Determines if this mojo must be executed.
072     * @return true if the mojo is enabled
073     */
074    protected abstract boolean isEnabled();
075
076    /**
077     * Configures the OpenAPI generator. When this method is called,
078     * common properties shared by all generators have already been
079     * configured, so this method should only take care of configuring
080     * the generator specific parameters.
081     * @param builder the generator configuration builder
082     */
083    protected abstract void configureBuilder(MicronautCodeGeneratorBuilder builder);
084
085    @Override
086    public final void execute() throws MojoExecutionException, MojoFailureException {
087        if (!isEnabled()) {
088            getLog().debug(this.getClass().getSimpleName() + " is disabled");
089            return;
090        }
091        project.addCompileSourceRoot(outputDirectory.getAbsolutePath());
092        var builder = MicronautCodeGeneratorEntryPoint.builder()
093                .withDefinitionFile(definitionFile.toURI())
094                .withOutputDirectory(outputDirectory)
095                .withOutputs(
096                        outputKinds.stream().map(String::toUpperCase).map(MicronautCodeGeneratorEntryPoint.OutputKind::valueOf).toList().toArray(new MicronautCodeGeneratorEntryPoint.OutputKind[0])
097                )
098                .withOptions(options -> {
099                    options.withInvokerPackage(invokerPackageName);
100                    options.withApiPackage(apiPackageName);
101                    options.withModelPackage(modelPackageName);
102                    options.withBeanValidation(useBeanValidation);
103                    options.withOptional(useOptional);
104                    options.withReactive(useReactive);
105                    options.withSerializationLibrary(SerializationLibraryKind.MICRONAUT_SERDE_JACKSON);
106                });
107        configureBuilder(builder);
108        builder.build().generate();
109    }
110}
